item.title: Persistent volumes with GlusterFS
item.description: It’s been a while since I had the original vision of how storage might work with Kubernetes. I had seen a project called Heketi that helped to make GlusterFS live inside the Kubernetes infrastructure itself. I wasn’t entirely convinced on this approach because I wasn’t necessarily comfortable with Kubernetes managing its own storage infrastructure. This is the story about how wrong I was.
